text.div:
Lyme Disease (Tests for Borrelia burgdorferi Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    10846-4 Borrelia burgdorferi DNA [Presence] in Blood by Probe with amplification
    10847-2 Borrelia burgdorferi DNA [Presence] in Body fluid by Probe with amplification
    11551-9 Borrelia burgdorferi DNA [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Probe with amplification
    19052-0 Borrelia burgdorferi DNA [Presence] in Urine by Probe with amplification
    21120-1 Borrelia burgdorferi DNA [Presence] in Urine by NAA with probe detection
    32667-8 Borrelia burgdorferi DNA [Presence] in Blood by NAA with probe detection
    32668-6 Borrelia burgdorferi DNA [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by NAA with probe detection
    32669-4 Borrelia burgdorferi DNA [Presence] in Synovial fluid by NAA with probe detection
    35638-6 Borrelia burgdorferi DNA [Presence] in Tissue by NAA with probe detection
    42589-2 Borrelia burgdorferi DNA [Presence] in Body fluid by NAA with probe detection
    4991-6 Borrelia burgdorferi DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    90893-9 Borrelia burgdorferi bba64 gene [Presence] in Blood by NAA with non-probe detection
